name: Syntrum
intro: Blockchain Infrastructure for DeFi, Gaming and NFT
introduce: Syntrum is a multi-layer blockchain infrastructure and ecosystem designed with economic consideration, scalability, and interoperability at its core. It provides developers and projects with the necessary tools and services to build and grow their ventures in a cost-effective manner. The Syntrum blockchain uses a unique combination of Proof of Staked Authority (PoSA) and Proof of Value (PoV) consensus mechanisms to achieve gasless transactions and real-time interoperability without the need for layer 2 bridge applications.
